rows.label: qst200825_msg0002
rows.name: Oh! Hotaru-chan, you did a great job.

rows.label: qst200825_msg0003
rows.name:
I'll mix them now, so
please wait a moment.

rows.label: qst200825_msg0004
rows.name: Sorry to keep you waiting, Hotaru-chan.

rows.label: qst200825_msg0005
rows.name:
This is the fungicide
and antidesiccant.

rows.label: qst200825_msg0006
rows.name:
You should be able to get
a splint if you go to the
Saets Lumber Company.

rows.label: qst200825_msg0008
rows.name:
No, no, no thanks are necessary.
Hotaru-chan's smile is enough for me.

rows.label: qst200825_msg0013
rows.name:
I'll go to the Saets
Lumber Company now.

rows.label: qst200825_msg0014
rows.name:
Yeah, be careful then.
Come visit anytime.
